title: Startown
atmosphere: Small-town frontier. A few hotels, shops, and the Dusty Airlock bar. Locals are friendly but reserved with offworlders. Vargr are present but keep to themselves.
description: After clearing customs, Travellers settle into Startown - the commercial district near the starport. Here they can find lodging, gather intelligence, and arrange their meeting with Minister Greener in the capital.
objectives: Gather intelligence about the previous crew
Learn about local conditions and hazards
Get a feel for Walston society

triggers.entry: Travellers clear customs and enter Startown
triggers.exit: Travellers arrange meeting and travel to capital

stages.name: Finding Lodging
stages.objective: Secure rooms at Frontier Inn, stow equipment and cargo
stages.description: The Frontier Inn is the better option - clean, functional, and the innkeeper is discreet about offworlder business.

stages.name: Local Investigation
stages.objective: Gather intel about the ship, previous crew, and local conditions
stages.description: The Dusty Airlock bar is where information flows. A few drinks and the right questions can reveal useful intelligence.

stages.name: Arranging the Meeting
stages.objective: Contact Minister Greener's office and arrange travel to the capital
stages.description: The Minister's office is in the capital at Central Lake, connected by rail. An appointment must be scheduled.

locations.dusty_airlock: The main bar. Bartender knows everyone's business.

bartender_carouse: Previous crew were jerks - got drunk, made trouble
Something's going on at the volcano - officials are worried
The Dictator's Vargr chauffeur is one of the good ones
customs_persuade: Ship tracking records show the previous crew's movements
They filed departure paperwork before leaving on a commercial transport

vargr_notes: Travellers with Vargr PCs or who pay attention will notice the social dynamics. Vargr work many jobs but there's only one in government. They're accepted but not equal.
narrator_prompt: Startown isn't much - a frontier settlement serving the starport. But every town has its stories, and the bartender at the Dusty Airlock has heard them all. A few drinks and the right questions might reveal useful intelligence.
